Peter Berg (Hancock) produces and directs Battleship, an epic adventure of action that begins at sea and in the skies and and continues. land, in which our planet fight for survival against a superior force unknown. Based on the classic naval battle game from Hasbro, this film stars Taylor Kitsch as Hopper, a naval officer Crowded the USS John Paul Jones; Brooklyn Decker as Sam, one physiotherapist who is the bride of Hopper, Alexander Skarsgard, who plays the older brother of Hopper, the Commanding Officer Stone of the USS Samson; Rihanna as Lt. Raikes, Hopper crew member and an expert on weapons of USS John Paul Jones, and international superstar Liam Neeson as Admiral Shane (Sam's father ) and top commander of Hopper and Stone. Berg directs this epic action-adventure also produced by Brian Goldner and Bennett Schneirda Hasbro (the Transformers franchise), along with Scott Stuber (Couples Retreat), Sarah Aubrey (The Kingdom) and Duncan Henderson (Master and Commander).
